title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 15.13 - Agreement controlling and determinative
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 15.13 - Agreement controlling and determinative

State Regulations
(a) The Commissioner of Motor Vehicles and
the commissioner of finance agree that this agreement shall be exclusively
controlling and determinative of the respective authorities, responsibilities, duties, obligations and liabilities of the respective parties with respect to
the collection, administration, custody, remittal and enforcement of the tax as
imposed by the City of New York pursuant to the code. (b) This agreement shall be construed in
accordance with the laws of New York State and New York City, including all
future amendments thereto. In the event of any conflict between this agreement
and any such law, the law shall supersede this agreement, but any provision of
the agreement not affected by such conflict shall remain in effect. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
15.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
